pr_title: Only allow the Entity List Action button to be clicked once

timeline.message: only allow the action listener to be clicked once

timeline.bodyText:
Extremely minor point: I don't think this is a real concern, but if the EntityList view was recycled entirely (IE: The use pressed 'back' and the view came up exactly as it was) it would be the case that this button would remain disabled.
Again, I don't think this applies to the way we use the views, but I didn't want to discount it entirely in case you knew differently, since you have worked with this more recently than  I have.
timeline.author: ctsims

replies.bodyText: @ctsims Thanks for flagging. You are right that it's a non concern as onClick here calls EntitySelectActivity.triggerDetailAction which is a terminal operation in the sense that it always finish the current activity. So pressing back always results in CommCare session to recreate the EntityListActivity again re-enabling the action button.
replies.author: shubham1g5
